mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO (USER_ID, PASSWORD, NAME, NICKNAME, EMAIL, PHONE, FAV_TEAM_ID) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{favTeamId})
mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID as userId, PASSWORD as userPw, NAME as userName, NICKNAME as nickName, EMAIL, PHONE, FAV_TEAM_ID as favTeamId, AUTH FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT USER_ID as userId, PASSWORD as userPw, NAME as userName, NICKNAME as nickName, EMAIL, PHONE, FAV_TEAM_ID as favTeamId, AUTH FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND PASSWORD = #{userPw}
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_INFO SET PASSWORD = #{userPw}, NAME = #{userName}, NICKNAME = #{nickName}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE = #{phone}, FAV_TEAM_ID = #{favTeamId} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM USER_INFO WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND PASSWORD = #{userPw}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WITHDRAWAL_HISTORY WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND WITHDRAWAL_DATE > SYSDATE - 90
